CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Nevertheless , a low power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) has been the largest obstacle in OPVs.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PCE - Power Conversion Efficiency
2. OPVs - Organic Photovoltaics
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PCE - Power Conversion Efficiency (Material Name)

So, the only entity that clearly refers to a "Material Name" in the given paragraph is "PCE".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
